description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. After an emergency landing, Telly's spaceship has been stolen by a strange and dark professor. As Milie, a young mechanic girl, help him to find it back. Ride your motorbike, fight against a whole army of robots and defeat the professor in this scrolling shooter.
description.short: After an emergency landing, Telly's spaceship has been stolen by a strange and dark professor. As Milie, a young mechanic girl, help him to find it back. Ride your motorbike, fight against a whole army of robots and defeat the professor in this scrolling shooter.
